provider.tf
variables.tf
main.tf

terraform.tfvars
files.content:
aws_region    = "ap-south-1"
project_name  = "nodeapp"
environment   = "dev"

# Buildkite sets BUILDKITE_BUILD_NUMBER; pass it as TF_VAR_image_tag in CI.
image_tag     = "latest"

desired_count = 1
cpu           = 256
memory        = 512
container_port = 3000

enable_s3     = false
# s3_bucket_name = "my-unique-bucket-name"

enable_https        = false
# acm_certificate_arn = "arn:aws:acm:ap-south-1:123456789012:certificate/xxxx"
